mdException.name: dss.vector.solutions.irs.InvalidMemberIDException
mdException.label: Invalid Member ID Exception
mdException.description: Thrown when the user attempts to access a team member with an invalid id

mdException.name: dss.vector.solutions.irs.InvalidOperatorIDException
mdException.label: Invalid Operator ID Exception
mdException.description: Thrown when the user attempts to access a spray operator with an invalid id

mdException.name: dss.vector.solutions.irs.InvalidLeaderIDException
mdException.label: Invalid Leader ID Exception
mdException.description: Thrown when the user attempts to access a team leader with an invalid id
